summary: A patch for the Populated series. Rebalances inventories to be more appropriate for Requiem, and makes some NPCs' inventories more entertaining/immersive.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]A patch for the Populated series. Specifically, Nexus user Adolphen's tweaked versions:
[/size][size=2]Populated Cities Towns Villages Reborn: nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73167/?[/size][size=2]
Populated Lands Roads Paths Reborn: nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73186/?[/size][size=2]
Populated Forts Towers Places Reborn: nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73177/?[/size][size=2]

[/size][size=2]Not edited:[/size][size=2]
Populated Skyrim Prisons Cells Reborn: nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73194/?
[/size][size=2]Populated Dungeons Caves Ruins Reborn: nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73212/?[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]About:[/size]
[size=2]Rebalances inventories to be more appropriate for Requiem, and makes some NPCs' inventories more entertaining/immersive.[/size][size=2]


Note:
Only newly generated NPCs will be affected. So, that's when they are recycled, when you haven't been to their location before, or when you start a new game.
[/size][size=2]

[/size][size=2]Changes:
[/size][size=2]- Removed Daedra Heart from vendors[/size][size=2]
- Non-combat NPCs given interesting inventories: Beggar, Servant, Hunter, (some others)
[/size][size=2]- Combat NPCs inventories nerfed
[/size][size=2] ﻿- Archers have arrows reduced ~200 -> ~25[/size][size=2]
﻿- Mage gear changed from static 'Adept' level, to between Novice-Adept (favouring Novice)[/size][size=2]
﻿﻿- Potions drastically reduced in amount and quality
[/size][size=2] ﻿- Gold reduced (it's now about as much as bandits)
[/size][size=2]- Many NPCs given some food/drink
[/size][size=2]- Town-based NPCs' inventories incorporate standard Skyrim leveled lists, same as vanilla NPCs (compatible with overhauls)[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]
Changelog:
[/size][size=2]v 1.2
- Fixed Wandering Knights not fighting back
- Lower chance of Citizens having empty pockets
- Small chance for Hunter to have gold from selling his loot
- Priests can have healing scrolls, potion of cleansing

v 1.1
[/size][size=2]- Updated for Requiem 2.0.0+
[/size][size=2]- Improved some leveled lists (use more vanilla lists, lower chance of empty)[/size][size=2]
- Reduced arrows on a few more NPCs 300 -> 25[/size][size=2]

[/size][size=2]v 1.0[/size][size=2]
- Creation[/size][size=2]
[/size]
